required_header.download_date: ClinicalTrials.gov processed this data on November 19, 2021
required_header.link_text: Link to the current ClinicalTrials.gov record.

clinical_study.brief_title: The Effect of CQI on the Outcome of Patients Supported With ECMO
clinical_study.official_title: The Effect of Continuous Quality Improvement on the Outcome of Patients Supported With Extracorporeal Membrane Oxygenation in ICU

lead_sponsor.agency: The Affiliated Hospital of Qingdao University

clinical_study.source: The Affiliated Hospital of Qingdao University

brief_summary.textblock: This was a prospective observational study in comparison with a retrospective control group(Jan 2015 to Jun 2019). Two ICUs in China were included. The continuous quality improvement (CQI)strategies were implemented from Jul 2019 to Jun 2021(CQI group). The mortalities of ECMO patients was compared between the CQI group and the control group.

primary_outcome.measure: The mortality of patients supported with ECMO

intervention.description: We implement the continuous quality improvement strategy in CQI group, and observe the effect of the strategy on the mortality of patients supported with ECMO .

study_pop.textblock: Patients over 18 years old who received ECMO support in the centers between January 2015 and April 2021 were included, not including patients waiting for transplantation with ECMO.

criteria.textblock:
Inclusion Criteria:
- Patients over 18 years old who received ECMO support in the centers
Exclusion Criteria:
- patients waiting for transplantation with ECMO.

facility.name: The Affiliated Hospital of Qingdao University

responsible_party.investigator_affiliation: The Affiliated Hospital of Qingdao University
